fix.issue: Git push failing - "Host key verification failed"
fix.cause: OpenClaw container had no SSH keys mounted

solution.action: Created /root/openclaw-ssh with keys owned by uid 1000
Mounted SSH keys into container at /home/node/.ssh

fix.issue: Git operations failing - "insufficient permission for adding object to repository"
fix.cause: OpenPaint .git directory owned by root, container runs as node (uid 1000)

fix.issue: curveDebug not defined - breaking line drawing
fix.cause: Function defined inside nested scope, called from outer scope
fix.solution: Moved curveDebug to module level in FabricControls.js

molty-capabilities.capability: Can push to GitHub via SSH
Requires manual tab attachment via extension
